scripts.devtest: npm run build && cross-env HC_APP_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) APP_DEV=true concurrently "npm run start:happ" "npm run start:ui"
scripts.devtest:ludo: npm run build && cross-env HC_APP_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) APP_DEV=true concurrently "npm run start:happ:ludo" "npm run start:ui"
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate ../artifacts/where.happ --run=$HC_APP_PORT -a where-applet network mdns
scripts.start:happ:ludo: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate ../artifacts/ludotheque.happ --run=$HC_APP_PORT -a ludotheque-applet network mdns
